Package spaces.magenta_spaces

Class HaveTwins

java.lang.Object
spaces.ColoredSpace
spaces.MagentaSpace
spaces.magenta_spaces.HaveTwins
public class HaveTwins
extends MagentaSpace
Class implementing a have twins space.

Players on a have twins space have two babies and receive gifts from every other player if they are married.

  • Field Details

    • GIFT_AMOUNT

      public static final int GIFT_AMOUNT
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • HaveTwins

      public HaveTwins​(int index, int nextIndex)
      Creates a have twins space object

      In particular, a have twins space has its attributes initialized as follows:

      • Its name is assigned as "Have Twins".
      • Its index on the board is assigned the passed parameter index.
      • Its next index is assigned the passed parameter nextIndex.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the space on the board
      nextIndex - the index of the next space the player can move to from this space

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute​(Player currPlayer, java.util.ArrayList<Player> players, Bank b)
      Execute the action associated with this space; that is, the player has twins and receives cash gifts from every other player

      On a have twins space, the player receives $10000 from every other player as a gift if they are married.

      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      players - list of players in the game
      b - Bank object of the game

    • getInfo

      public java.lang.String getInfo​(Player currPlayer)
      Returns the string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a have twins space

      In particular, if the player is married, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name], you are on a Have Baby space. Receive [gift amount * 2] from every other player as a gift."

      If the player is not married, the returned string reads as follows: "[Player name] is not married."

      Specified by:
      getInfo in class MagentaSpace
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - current player with turn
      Returns:
      string to be used as a prompt in the actual gameplay when the player is on a have twins space
